title: Update Problems
body: Every time I launch League it tells me it restored my game to a previous version then updates itself all over again. I have gone through this 13 times in the past week and its starting to get annoying. Any idea's on how to either fix this or what is causing it?

replies.body:
It sounds like something is going wrong during the patching process which is making your client need to try patching again over and over and....

We should be able to get it working correctly again by forcing a full repatch with our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Grab that tool and run it with **Force Repatch** and let me know how that helps!

After I posted this, the problem stopped entirely. I've launched the game multiple times just to check and it hasn't updated it since. If the problem pops back up I will try the repair tool but it seems to have cleared itself up for the moment.
